page.title: 08BENENDEN WEALD, RECREATION.
page.content: I live in the country outside Benenden village, so I have to go everywhere by car with Mummy or Daddy as there are hardly any buses, but I use my bicycle or walk on the public foot paths. My only real receation time is on Sundays and Saturdays. I play junior squash and tennis at Hawkhurst. I like swimming and the nearest pools are in Maidstone and Tunbridge Wells. At Christmas time I enjoy being in the village pantomime which takes up every Sunday afternoon. When I am at home I play games with my sister and also use our computer. I collect stickers and coloured paper. In the summer I play many garden games such as croquet and badminton and I have a lot of fun with my three guinea pigs.
